title.en: The Moon’s Illusory Reflection to Gladden the Devoted

text.en: Namo Mañjuśriye.
text.en-trans: namo manjushri ye

text.en: Embodiment of the wisdom of all the buddhas throughout space,
text.en-trans: khakhyab gyalwa kün gyi yeshe ku

text.en: Only father of the victorious ones, noble treasury of knowledge,
text.en-trans: gyalwé yab chik jetsün khyenpé ter

text.en: Who dismantles the entanglements of delusion—
text.en-trans: mongpé drawa tadak dul dzepa

text.en: Transcendent conqueror Mañjughoṣa, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: chomden jampé yang la solwa deb

text.en: Supreme heir to the speech of the King of Śākyas,
text.en-trans: shakyé gyalpö sung gi sé kyi chok

text.en: Best of men, famed as the Licchavi,
text.en-trans: mi yi chokgyur litsawi zhé drak

text.en: Known as Priyadarśana the Youthful—
text.en-trans: zhönnu tong na gawé tsen gyi nyen

text.en: Vimalakīrti, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: drimé drakpé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Great heart-son of the heroic Garab Dorje,
text.en-trans: garab pawö tuk kyi sé chenpo

text.en: Treasure of vast intelligence and limitless wisdom,
text.en-trans: khyen rab tayé lodrö chenpö ter

text.en: Magnificent pioneer of the teachings of the three classes and nine spaces—
text.en-trans: dé sum long gü tenpé shingta ché

text.en: Mañjuśrīmitra, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: mandzu mitré zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Perfecter of the four visions who matured into a body of awareness-light,
text.en-trans: nang zhi tar sön rigpa ökur min

text.en: Inhabiter of indestructible vajra form at the Five-Peaked Mountain,
text.en-trans: dorjé ku nyé riwo tsé ngar zhuk

text.en: Elucidator of the essential teachings through various emanations—
text.en-trans: trulpé nyingpö tenpa salwar jé

text.en: Vimalamitra, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: bima mitré zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Preeminent among those who have accomplished Supreme Bliss,
text.en-trans: dewa chok gi drubpa nyepé pul

text.en: Binder of all the phenomena of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa within the great circle,1
text.en-trans: sizhi chö kün khorlo chenpor dom

text.en: You travelled to the celestial realm together with your consort and son—
text.en-trans: yumsé dangché khachö né su shek

text.en: Vajraghaṇṭapāda, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: dorjé drilbupa la solwa deb

text.en: You reached the limits of fivefold scientific knowledge,
text.en-trans: né nga rigpa gyatsö patar sön

text.en: Gained supreme accomplishment through the path of mantra,
text.en-trans: ngak kyi lam lé ngödrub chok nyé shing

text.en: And were lauded by the learned ones of the noble land—
text.en-trans: pakyul khepa dumé chak jepa

text.en: Great paṇḍita Anantamukhamati, to you I pray.2
text.en-trans: penchen go tayepar solwa deb

text.en: Mañjughoṣa himself emanating as a sovereign of the Land of Snows,
text.en-trans: jampal yang nyi gangchen gyalpor trul

text.en: You constructed the great temple and spread the sūtra and mantra teachings,
text.en-trans: tsuklakhang zheng do ngak tenpa pel

text.en: And received the transmission of Assembly of Sugatas with marvellous aspiration—
text.en-trans: der dü kabab tukkyé mé du jung

text.en: Tri Songdetsen, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: trisong dé tsen zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Born into the family of the dharma-king,
text.en-trans: chö kyi gyalpö rik su ku trung shing

text.en: Cared for by the guru and entrusted with the Gathering of Transmitted Precepts,3
text.en-trans: gurü tuk zin ka dü nyer du té

text.en: You accomplished great benefit for teachings and beings in thirteen lifetimes—
text.en-trans: kyewa chusum ten drö dönchen drub

text.en: Gyalse Lharje, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: gyalsé lharjé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Padma’s heart-son from the family of Nub,
text.en-trans: nub kyi rik lé pemé tuk kyi sé

text.en: You gained genuine accomplishment and rode on the rays of the sun,
text.en-trans: yangdak drub nyé nyimé zer la chib

text.en: Becoming a court chaplain for Ngadak Tsangpa—4
text.en-trans: ngadak tsangpé la yi chöné dzé

text.en: Namkhai Nyingpo, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: namkhé nyingpö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Heart son who was cared for by the great master,
text.en-trans: lobpön chenpö jezung tuk kyi sé

text.en: Langdro Lotsāwa, you shot thunderbolts like arrows,
text.en-trans: lang dro lotsa tok chen da tar pen

text.en: And possessed the skill and power of magical activity—
text.en-trans: tutob trinlé nüpé tsal changwa

text.en: Könchok Jungne, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: könchok jungné zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Heart-son of Marpa and recipient of the transmission oftummopractice,
text.en-trans: marpé tuksé tummö kabab shing

text.en: Who, through extreme hardship gained supreme accomplishment in a single life,
text.en-trans: kaché chenpö tsé dir chok ngödrub

text.en: Even to hear your name liberates from the terrors of the lower realms—
text.en-trans: tsen tö ngensong jik lé namdrolwa

text.en: Mila Shepa Dorje, to you I pray.5
text.en-trans: mi la zhepa dorjér solwa deb

text.en: Master of profound terma born in the family of Nyang,
text.en-trans: nyang gi rik lé ku trung zabter dak

text.en: Lord who possesses a diadem of blue-black locks,
text.en-trans: tönting ralpé chöpen changwé jé

text.en: You brought forth an ocean of profound treasures at Khoting and elsewhere—
text.en-trans: kho ting lasok zabter gyatso jin

text.en: Nyima Özer, at your feet I pray.6
text.en-trans: nyima özer zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Protector of beings in this chilly Land of Snows
text.en-trans: silden khawé jong kyi kyewo nam

text.en: Against the causes and effects of mental afflictions and suffering,
text.en-trans: nyönmong dukngal gyundré lé kyobpa

text.en: The king of physicians in ordinary human form—
text.en-trans: menpé gyalpo mi yi shatsuk chen

text.en: Yönten Gönpo, at your feet I pray.7
text.en-trans: yönten gönpö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Emanation of Tri Song, foremost of the saffron-robed,
text.en-trans: trisong trulpa ngurmik changwé tso

text.en: Nāgārjuna in person, master of the teachings of the practice lineage,
text.en-trans: ludrub ngö jön drubgyü tenpé dak

text.en: Lord whose benefit to beings extends throughout this vast world—
text.en-trans: dro dön dzamling tadrur khyabpé jé

text.en: Kyobpa Rinchen, at your feet I pray.8
text.en-trans: kyobpa rinchen zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Born into the Khön family, preeminent among the learned, ethical and kind,
text.en-trans: khön gyi rik trung khé tsün zangpö pul

text.en: You disciplined all those beings who are difficult to train,
text.en-trans: dul ké drowa tadak dul dzé ching

text.en: And were worshipped by the haughty with the jewels of their crowns—
text.en-trans: drekden tsuk gi norbü chak jepa

text.en: Chögyal Pakpa, at your feet I pray.9
text.en-trans: chögyal pakpé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Born in Lowo, you became a wise and learned lotsāwa,
text.en-trans: lowor ku trung lo tsa khepar khyen

text.en: Gained advanced realization through Red Mañjuśrī,
text.en-trans: jampal marpö drubpa tönpor shek

text.en: With limitless qualities of learning and accomplishment—
text.en-trans: khé dang drubpé yönten tayepa

text.en: Sherab Rinchen, at your feet I pray.10
text.en-trans: sherab rinchen zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Jamyang Sakyapa possessing the three supreme names,11
text.en-trans: tsen chok sumden jamyang sakyapa

text.en: You extended teaching, practice and activity to the far reaches of space,
text.en-trans: shedrub trinlé namkhé tar khyab ching

text.en: Vast treasury of oceanic knowledge, love and capacity—
text.en-trans: khyen tsé nüpa gyatsö ter chenpo

text.en: Sonam Gyaltsen, at your feet I pray.12
text.en-trans: sönam gyaltsen zhab la solwa deb

text.en: You reached the distant shore of oceanic learning in outer and inner scriptural traditions
text.en-trans: chinang zhungluk gyatsö patar sön

text.en: And perfected the great strength of Samantabhadra’s realization,
text.en-trans: kuntuzangpö gongpé tsal chen dzok

text.en: Great pioneer of the pinnacle of Vajra Luminosity—
text.en-trans: ösal dorjé tsemö shingta ché

text.en: Longchen Rabjam, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: longchen rabjam zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Further incarnation of the omniscient Dolpopa,
text.en-trans: künkhyen dolpo lar yang trulpé kur

text.en: You were guided by Padma and looked after Tibet,
text.en-trans: zheng né pemé jezung bö kham kyong

text.en: Crown ornament of all masters of unconventional conduct—
text.en-trans: tulzhuk drubpa yong kyi tsuk gi gyen

text.en: Thangtong Gyalpo, at your feet I pray.13
text.en-trans: tangtong gyalpö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Heart-son of the omniscient Kunga Zangpo,
text.en-trans: künkhyen künga zangpö tuk kyi sé

text.en: Cakrasaṃvara emanating in saffron robes,
text.en-trans: khorlo dompa ngurmik gar gyur zhing

text.en: Lord of all who have mastered twofold bodhicitta—
text.en-trans: changchub sem nyi jongpa kün gyi jé

text.en: Könchok Gyaltsen, at your feet I pray.14
text.en-trans: könchok gyaltsen zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Outwardly, you wore the robes of threefold purity,
text.en-trans: chitar nam sum tsangmé gö kyi lub

text.en: Inwardly, your being was suffused with bodhicitta,
text.en-trans: nang du changchub sem kyi tukgyü tam

text.en: Secretly, you reached the supreme level of Vajradhara—
text.en-trans: sangwa dorjé dzinpé sa chok nyé

text.en: Zhalu Khyenrab Chöje, to you I pray.15
text.en-trans: zhalu khyenrab chöjer solwa deb

text.en: Blessed heir to Ratna Lingpa’s speech and mind,
text.en-trans: ratna lingpé tuk sung jinlab sé

text.en: You lived to a hundred and ten and sustained the profound terma teachings,
text.en-trans: gya dang chu zhuk zabter tenpa kyong

text.en: Accomplished invidyāmantra, protector of the teachings and beings—
text.en-trans: rik ngak drubpa ten dang drowé gön

text.en: Tsewang Drakpa, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: tsewang drakpé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Deliberate incarnation of the great Sakya Paṇḍita,
text.en-trans: sakya penchen samzhin trulpé ku

text.en: Whom Padma foretold as an emanation of Vairotsana,
text.en-trans: bairö trulpar pemé lung gi nyé

text.en: Skilled in the five sciences, the one known as Sakya Lotsāwa—
text.en-trans: né nga rigpa sakya lotsa zhé

text.en: Jampé Dorje, at your feet I pray.16
text.en-trans: jampé dorjé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Emanation of the sovereign ruler’s enlightened qualities,
text.en-trans: ngadak gyalpö yönten nampar trul

text.en: You were born in Lowo Matang in Ngari,
text.en-trans: ngari lowo matang ku tam shing

text.en: And impartially studied and practised an ocean of teachings—
text.en-trans: rimé tenpa gyatsor sen jong dzé

text.en: Pema Wangyal, at your feet I pray.17
text.en-trans: pema wanggyal zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Born in the Azha family, you were Tsarchen’s supreme heart-son,
text.en-trans: a zhé rik trung tsar chen tuksé chok

text.en: Inseparable in your wisdom from Mañjughoṣa himself
text.en-trans: khyen rab jampal yang dang nyisumé

text.en: And blessed by the supreme deities of the Three Roots—
text.en-trans: tsa sum lhakpé lha yi jin gyi lab

text.en: Khyentse Wangchuk, at your feet I pray.18
text.en-trans: khyentsé wangchuk zhab la solwa deb

text.en: The Lord of Secrets manifesting as a white-robed householder,
text.en-trans: sangwé dakpo gö kar changwar tön

text.en: A recipient of fierce mantras and lord of vidyā mantras,
text.en-trans: drakngak kabab rik ngak changwé jé

text.en: You subjugated unruly and malevolent forces—
text.en-trans: ma rung dukpachen nam dul dzepa

text.en: Tashi Tobgyal, at your feet I pray.19
text.en-trans: tashi tobgyal zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Emanation of Vimalamitra, infinitely pure of perception,
text.en-trans: bimé trulpa daknang jam lé shing

text.en: Universal monarch among masters of unconventional conduct,
text.en-trans: tulzhuk drubpa nam kyi khorlö gyur

text.en: Glorious heruka, great warrior Lhatsün—
text.en-trans: heruka pal lhatsün pawo ché

text.en: Namkha Jigme, at your feet I pray.20
text.en-trans: namkha jikme zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Prophesied by the Buddha in sūtras and tantras
text.en-trans: dogyü nam lé gyalwé lung gi ngak

text.en: As a supreme guardian to oversee the northern land,
text.en-trans: jangchok kyongwé kyobpa chokgyur pa

text.en: Sole ornament of this world, revered by gods and men alike—
text.en-trans: dzamling gyen chik lhami chö ö gyur

text.en: Ngawang Lobzang Gyatso, to you I pray.21
text.en-trans: ngawang lobzang gyatsor solwa deb

text.en: Born as the physical heir of Gyurme Dorje,22
text.en-trans: gyurmé dorjé ku yi sé su tam

text.en: You accomplished Hayagrīva and joined the family of the Mighty One’s speech;
text.en-trans: tamdrin drub nyé wangchen sung gi rik

text.en: With your vast intelligence you understood infinite fields of knowledge—
text.en-trans: lodrö chenpö sheja rabjam khyen

text.en: Pema Gyurme Gyatso, to you I pray.23
text.en-trans: pema gyurmé gyatsor solwa deb

text.en: Further incarnation, great hero of the Nyö clan,
text.en-trans: dé yi yangsi nyö rik pawo ché

text.en: You brought delight to all who saw you, even the gods,
text.en-trans: lhar ché kyegü tong na rabga zhing

text.en: And were a supreme bodhisattva benefitting others—
text.en-trans: changchub sempa zhen la penpé chok

text.en: Tsangyang Gyatso, at your feet I pray.24
text.en-trans: tsang yang gyatsö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Final birth of Langdro Lotsāwa, holder of profound terma teachings,
text.en-trans: langdrö kyé ta zabter tenpa dzin

text.en: You accomplished the form of Padma Drakpo and subjugated the eight classes,
text.en-trans: pema drakpö ku drub dé gyé dul

text.en: Becoming a conqueror to subdue elemental spirits in this degenerate age—
text.en-trans: nyikdü jungpo dulwé shé du gyur

text.en: Longsal Nyingpo, at your feet I pray.25
text.en-trans: longsal nyingpö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Your supreme affinity for the great vehicle was fully awakened,
text.en-trans: tekpa chenpö rik chok yongsu sé

text.en: Knots in your channels were undone, teachings poured forth from your expansive realization,
text.en-trans: tsa yi dü drol chö nam long né dol

text.en: And you took control of the sky-like treasury of mind terma—
text.en-trans: gongter namkha dzö la nga wang gyur

text.en: Jigme Lingpa, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: jikme lingpé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Vimalamitra manifesting in the form of a renunciant,
text.en-trans: drimé shenyen gejong tsul ten né

text.en: Who, over seven lifetimes, brought vast benefit to the teachings and beings,
text.en-trans: kyewa dün du ten drö dön chen drub

text.en: And was the fourth holder of the signs of irreversibility—
text.en-trans: chirmidokpé tak chang zhipa ni

text.en: Mingyur Namkhé Dorje, to you I pray.26
text.en-trans: mingyur namkhé dorjér solwa deb

text.en: To the great emanation of the body of Yeshe Dorje,
text.en-trans: yeshe dorjé ku dang küngé sung

text.en: The speech of Kunga, mind of Wangchok,
text.en-trans: wang chok tuktrul losal yönten dang

text.en: Qualities of Losal and activity of Khyentse Wangpo,
text.en-trans: jampal yang ngö khyentsé wangpo yi

text.en: Who was Mañjughoṣa in person, I pray.
text.en-trans: trinlé namtrul chenpor solwa deb

text.en: Emanation of Khyentse Wangpo’s activity,
text.en-trans: khyentsé wangpö trinlé trulpé ku

text.en: All-pervasive lord of the maṇḍala with threefold kindness,27
text.en-trans: kadrin sumden khyabdak khorlö gön

text.en: Inconceivable in your deeds to train beings of this degenerate age—
text.en-trans: nyikmé drodul dzepa sam mikhyab

text.en: Chökyi Lodrö, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: chökyi lodrö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: In future, in the emanated realm to the north,
text.en-trans: ma ong jangchok sachö trulpé zhing

text.en: In Shambhala, in the palace of the Kalapa Court,
text.en-trans: shambha la yi podrang kala par

text.en: May I be inseparable from Kulika Raudracakrin,
text.en-trans: rikden drakpo khorlo chak na chang

text.en: The victorious one with a wheel in his hand.
text.en-trans: nampar gyalwachen dang yermé shok

text.en: Turn your loving attention to this prayerful child.
text.en-trans: soldeb bu la tsewé rab gong té

text.en: And, from now on, in all my future lives,
text.en-trans: deng né zung té tserab tamché du

text.en: O supreme and noble master, guide and care for me,
text.en-trans: jetsün lama chok gi jezung zhing

text.en: And inspire me to accomplish my own and others’ benefit.
text.en-trans: rangzhen dön nyi drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: May the life of the Mañjughoṣa Guru long remain secure,
text.en-trans: jamyang lamé zhabpé yündu ten

text.en: May the teachings and those who uphold them spread far and wide,
text.en-trans: ten dang tendzin dar zhing gyepa dang

text.en: May all the current misery in the land of Tibet be pacified,
text.en-trans: bö kham dü kyi güpa kün zhi né

text.en: And may the splendour of happiness and joy enrich the entire world.
text.en-trans: jikten dé gé pal gyi jor gyur chik
